Well i've worked hard, which is more than i can say for most of the people who work on games like this.  and having (in total) 98 players log on within a week of ALPHA release, i'm quite pleased.

So why am i still here you ask? Why am i still at AxeUK?  simple, this is the place i first started to develop my own games, and because of Alex and his software i've come this far and released a somewhat decent online adventure game.  Opinions may differ from other members of this forum but the response i've had so far for this game is unbelievable.
